question: Who of the following will lay the foundation stone of a temple in Abu Dhabi?
explanation: Narendra Modi will lay the foundation stone of a temple in Abu Dhabi during his visit to the United Arab Emirates. The event will be part of a three-nation tour from February 9 to 12, starting in Palestine. The UAE granted the temple project after India conveyed the demand of its nationals for a place of worship during Mr. Modi's 2015 visit to the country.
